ViewObject.Name: UserAreaCustExclLocationLookup
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT NVL(AUL.LOCATION_CODE,FFVV.FLEX_VALUE_MEANING) AS LOC_CODE, NVL(AUL.LOCATION_DESC,FFVV.DESCRIPTION) AS LOC_LABEL, NVL(AUL.LOCATION_CODE,FFVV.FLEX_VALUE_MEANING) || ' ' || NVL(AUL.LOCATION_DESC,FFVV.DESCRIPTION) AS LOC_SEARCH FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, APP_USER_LOC AUL, PROMO_CUSTX_AREA PCA, APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FFV, APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL FFVV WHERE FFVV.FLEX_VALUE = AC.ATTRIBUTE5 AND FFV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FFVV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID AND FFV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'FCSAR_TERRITORY_LOCATION' AND AC.ATTRIBUTE5 = AUL.LOCATION_CODE(+) AND PCA.PROMO_CUSTX_AREA_ID = :promoCustxId AND NVL(AUL.USER_NAME,1) = ( SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM APP_USER_LOC AUL1 WHERE AUL1.USER_NAME = :userName) = 0 THEN NVL(AUL.USER_NAME,1) ELSE :userName END FROM DUAL ) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE3 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUR.REGION_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUR.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AUR.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE3) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUR.REGION_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUR.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AUR.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.REGION_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.REGION_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE3 = PCA.REGION_CODE) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE4 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUA.AREA_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUA.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_AREA AUA WHERE AUA.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE4) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUA.AREA_CODE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUA.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_AREA AUA WHERE AUA.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.AREA_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.AREA_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE4 = PCA.AREA_CODE) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE8 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCT.CUST_TYPE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCT.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_TYPE AUCT WHERE AUCT.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE8) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCT.CUST_TYPE,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCT.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_TYPE AUCT WHERE AUCT.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.CUSTTYP_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.CUSTTYP_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE8 = PCA.CUSTTYP_CODE) AND AC.ATTRIBUTE1 IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCG.CUST_GROUP,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCG.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_GROUP AUCG WHERE AUCG.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.ATTRIBUTE1) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUCG.CUST_GROUP,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUCG.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST_GROUP AUCG WHERE AUCG.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.CUSTGRP_CODE IS NULL OR PCA.CUSTGRP_CODE = 'ALL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = PCA.CUSTGRP_CODE) AND AC.CUSTOMER_ID IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUC.CUSTOMER_ID,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUC.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST AUC WHERE AUC.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),AC.CUSTOMER_ID) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUC.CUSTOMER_ID,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUC.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_CUST AUC WHERE AUC.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND (1=(CASE WHEN (PCA.CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL OR PCA.CUSTOMER_ID = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OR AC.CUSTOMER_ID = PCA.CUSTOMER_ID) ORDER BY "LOC_LABEL"
